events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is damaged with multiple scratches on the surface and a faulty screen.
The reported problem involves a damaged product with scratches and a defective screen, categorizing this case under Product Defect.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product support agents who will assist you shortly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I'm here to help get this resolved quickly for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and faulty screen? This will help us process your case faster.
I have attached the photos showing the scratches and the screen not working properly. Please advise on next steps.
Thank you for the images. We will send a replacement unit at no extra cost and arrange return shipping for the defective product.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick resolution and arranging the replacement. I appreciate your help.
The replacement order has been processed, and return instructions have been emailed to you. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement product and that everything is working as expected.
Yes, I received the replacement and everything is perfect now. Thank you for your assistance throughout the process.
Glad to hear that the replacement meets your expectations. We are closing the case now, and weâ€™re here if you need anything else.
